function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Supply chain disruptions during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Economic activity and incomes are significantly affected","Mitigation":"Policy implementation to make supply chains more resilient","Technologies":"Supply chain monitoring and risk analysis tools","People":"Economies, businesses, and individuals","Owner":"Governments, businesses, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of localised economies to economic shocks","Impact":"Greater instability of economic variables such as real GDP","Mitigation":"Development of policies to make supply chains more resilient","Technologies":"Supply chain optimization and diversification","People":"Local businesses, governments, and international organizations","Owner":"Governments and international organizations"},{"Description":"Warning against reshoring of GVCs","Impact":"Loss of benefits from specialization and resilience in supply chains","Mitigation":"Developing policies to foster diversification and resilience in GVCs","Technologies":"Supply chain diversification and risk management tools","People":"Governments, businesses, and international organizations","Owner":"Governments and international organizations"}]}
